eu.digitisation.image

Class Bimage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • eu.digitisation.image.Bimage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderedImage, WritableRenderedImage, Transparency

    public class Bimage
extends BufferedImage
    Extends BufferedImage with some useful operations
    Author:
    R.C.C.

      • Bimage

        public Bimage(File file)
       throws IOException
        Create image from file content. Supported formats are: bmp, jpg, wbmp, jpeg, png, gif, tif (when used together with geotk-coverageio)
        Parameters:
        file - the file storing the image
        Throws:
        IOException
        NullPointerException - if the file format is unsupported
